abilities.description: Your flash fox uses its short-range teleportation to bypass obstacles. When you make a move by directing your flash fox to teleport you a short distance away, roll +its health and boost.

Your flash fox attempts to teleport you out of harm's way. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.905205c073b09eac]{Endure Harm}, you may roll +its health with advantage. If you do and score a hit, reduce the loss of health you suffered by 1. On a miss, your @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.d34cdf2408cd22b6]{Companion Takes a Hit} as well.

Your flash fox has learned to coordinate its teleporting attacks with your own. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} aided by the flash fox, add +1. If you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash}, take +1 momentum on a hit.
